name: Idle Furniture
description:
Start from a small local furniture store and upgrade it up to the biggest showroom in the world. Manage selling and upgrading process. Improve your business facilities.

Hire new staff, unlock a new type of selling furniture, keep your customers happy.



Features:


- Casual and easy gameplay
- Various facilities upgrades and income boosters
- Amazing animations and 3D graphics
- Unique products to sell!
- Make important managing decisions to expand your business
- Earn Money even offline.
- No internet connection needed



If you like idle and tapping games, you will enjoy this managing game. Idle Furniture Store is easy-to-play game where you run your own business. Make important management decisions to build the best store in the world!
